HOW TO INSTALL:

1) Download the file and save to a local drive. Do NOT unzip it!
2) Go to Administration, Module Loader
3) Browse for the zip file and click upload
4) Click on install

If you want, you can uninstall the package and restore your system
exactly to the previous state.

Provided to you by:
Kenneth Brill
2006-07-21 ken.brill@gmail.com
SugarCubed
